allow: Bash(sshpass -p 'NexVentures+022%' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no debian@141.227.158.64 "sudo kamctl ul show | grep -A 15 julien")
Bash(powershell -Command "echo ''NexVentures+022%'' | ssh debian@141.227.158.64 ''sudo kamctl ul show | grep -A 15 julien''")

Bash(sshpass -p 'NexVentures+022%' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no debian@141.227.158.64 "dpkg -l | grep -E ''rtpengine|rtpproxy|kamailio'' && echo ''---'' && systemctl status rtpengine 2>/dev/null || echo ''rtpengine not installed as service'' && echo ''---'' && ps aux | grep -E ''rtpengine|rtpproxy'' | grep -v grep")
Bash(powershell -Command "ssh debian@141.227.158.64 ''sudo systemctl restart kamailio && sleep 2 && sudo systemctl status kamailio''")

Bash(powershell -Command "ssh debian@141.227.158.64 ''echo ""=== Services ===""; systemctl is-active rtpengine kamailio; echo ""=== RTPEngine ports ===""; sudo ss -tuln | grep -E "":(30000|2223|2224)""; echo ""=== Kamailio ports ===""; sudo ss -tuln | grep -E "":(5060|5080|8443)""''")
Bash(powershell -Command "ssh debian@141.227.158.64 ''sudo ufw allow 30000:40000/udp comment RTPEngine-RTP''")

Bash(sshpass -p 'NexVentures+022%' ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no sip@192.168.1.115 "echo ''=== SYSTÈME ==='' && uname -a && echo && echo ''=== SERVICES ACTIFS ==='' && systemctl list-units --type=service --state=running | grep -E ''asterisk|mediamtx|docker|avahi'' && echo && echo ''=== DOCKER ==='' && docker ps 2>/dev/null || echo ''Docker non installé ou non accessible'' && echo && echo ''=== ASTERISK ==='' && which asterisk && asterisk -V 2>/dev/null || echo ''Asterisk non trouvé'' && echo && echo ''=== MEDIAMTX ==='' && which mediamtx 2>/dev/null || ls /opt/mediamtx 2>/dev/null || echo ''MediaMTX non trouvé'' && echo && echo ''=== PORTS OUVERTS ==='' && ss -tuln | grep -E '':5060|:8889|:8080|:5353''")
